attributes.action: Scrap Car park charges for NHS staff
attributes.additional_details: Our NHS staff are needed now more than ever, stop private companies making a profit from them
attributes.background: Do away with car park charges for all NHS staff

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Forever Free Parking for NHS and Care Workers
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/313385

Allow free parking for all NHS employees on NHS property or their place of work.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/312828
